cab.content: WAR CABINET S62a.Minutes of a Meeting of the War Cabinet held at 10, Downing Street,S.W. on Fruday, 8th. March, 1918, at 1 p.m.The Prime Minister (in the Chair)The Rt. Hon. the Earl Curson of The Rt. Hon. G. K. Barnes, 111.2.Zedleston, K.G.,G.C.S.I.,G.C.I.E.The Rt. Hon. the Viscount Milner, Lieutenant-General the Rt. Hon.G.C.B.,G.C.M.G- JWC.Smuts, K.C*The Rt. Hon. A. Bonar Law, M.P.,THE FOLLOWING. WERE ALSO PRESENT:-The Rt. Hon. A. J. Balfour, 0.M-,M.P., Secretary of State forForeign Affairs.Lieutenant-Colonel Sir M. P. A. Hanke , K.C.secretary.
